div.head: 子上衝心
div.div: an infant rises and clashes with the heart

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: an infant rises and clashes with the heart

sense.def: Alternative Names tai qi shang chong 胎氣上沖 , fetal qi rises and clashes [with the heart]; tai shang chong xin 胎上衝心 , a fetus rises and clashes with the heart; tai shang qiang xin 胎上搶 心 , a fetus rises and knocks at the heart; tai dong shang bi 胎動上逼 , fetal movement pressing upward; tai dong shang ge 胎動上膈 , fetal movement rising towards the diaphragm; tai dong po xin 胎動迫心 , fetal movement pressing against the heart. Pathological Condition of pregnant women experiencing chest and abdominal distension and a feeling of fullness, with hectic panting in serious cases, and vexation, restlessness and a failur to calm down. Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry pu tao 葡萄：妊孕人，子上衝心，飲 之即下，其胎安 , “When a pregnant woman experiences that her infant rises and clashes with the heart , drinking this will bring it down, and the fetus will be pacified”.
